item.description:
Come join me at Shea's for a Thursday night football game, they have a very good bar menu and 12 big screen TV's. I'll be cheering for the Patriots!! (Patriots vs. Jets - Thur., Nov. 13 - 8:15 p.m) This is a joint Meetup with my other group - the Hartford Area NFL Meetup - Betsy

Shea's website: http://www.sheasameri....

Shea's specials:
Thursdays: Ladies Night, 4:00-9:00 p.m.
* House Wine - $4.00 * House Martinis - $4.00
Monday - Thursday:
* Salad & entree: $7.95 (starting Nov. 10th) - Choose from 5 items on our specials menu.
* Late Night Happy Hour 10:00 p.m.-Midnight: Different drink specials and $1.00 off all well drinks.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: PATRIOTS VS JETS @ SHEA'S 11/13/08 8:00PM
